list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Feat: Add clickable social and GitHub links
This commit implements clickable links in the hero and footer sections.
- **Hero Section:** - The "View Systems" button now opens the user's GitHub repositories page.
- **Footer Section:** - Refactored the social links ("LinkedIn", "GitHub") into a new stateful `SocialLink` widget. - The new widget handles hover effects and opens the corresponding URL when tapped.
